text: Koraa, ‘niscaya mora pratipalake prakasya arau gopana ubhaya prakara aslilataka haraama karaiche, arau (haraama karaiche) papa arau an'yayabharae simalanghana arau kono bastuka allahara ansidara sthapana karaaka—yara kono dalila pramana allahe aratirna karaa na'i; arau allaha samparke ene kono katha koraato'o (haraama) yito tomaloke najana’
